item.description:
Hillary Clinton comes to Boston Symphony
Hall for a fundraiser event on Wednesday,
October 10th, 5.30 p.m.

It is a great opportunity to materialize
our "virtuality" and to get acquainted
with Ron Paul's future opponent. There
is a stereotype being sold to the public
that to be a Republican means, by default,
to be "pro-war". And Hillary, as the
leading Democrat, . last week once again.
voted for war (see Kyl-Lieberman
amendment)! I am really curious to hear
why people support Hillary. They probably
would not tell. Perhaps they don't know the
name of the only candidate who truly supports
them? Or perhaps they believe the official
propaganda that that candidate is
just an internet phenomenon?

Let's check it out with Ron Paul signs/banners!

Let's meet on Wednesday at 5:00 at the
corner of Massachusetts Ave and
Huntington Ave (301 Massachusetts Ave,
MA 02111). Hillary's supporters will
start arriving at 5:30.

Directions: Green E- Line, the Symphony
stop; or the Orange Line, the Mass Ave
stop; or bus #1 from Harvard Sq.; or
parking for Symphony Hall across the
street.

Here is the link to the Hillary's fundrising
event:
https://contribute.hi...
item.name: Let's Meet Hillary...and Introduce Ron Paul!
